Reviews.Title: Adequate
Reviews.Author: william
Reviews.Content: 4 stars for the functionality vs. price.  The cameras are the weak point of the system.  Color is a little off - my trees look pink to the camera but green to my eyes.  Night vision is nearly non-existent.  The playback and backup features of the web interface don't work for me, but they work within the provided desktop application.  16 channels, 8 cameras included with room for 8 more - 8 camera and power cables included.  Does not come supplied with a cable to connect to a monitor or TV so you have to buy one.  No Hard drive installed, but easy to install.  Records at a full 30 frames per second on each channel.  With a 160GB drive I get about 5 days on 8 cameras.  At $280 a decent system for a budget.

Reviews.Title: Great price, complete system
Reviews.Author: barkkari
Reviews.Content: This budget friendly system has everything you need to set up your security system and check it remotely.  Great product and great price!
